content: i love the ease and simplicity of stitches in this bay window market bag crochet pattern our bay window market bag crochet pattern today is worked from the bottom up and all as one piece it features a variety of simple and basic crochet stitches including single_crochet half_double_crochet and double_crochet stitches the design features row of crochet mesh that are interspersed between row of single and double_crochet stitches you may work the colour stripes in the design as i have or mix up the colours to suit your personal style a free copy of this crochet pattern can be found on my website https //richtexturescrochet com/bay-window-market-bag-crochet-pattern a free video tutorial for this crochet pattern can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level easy gauge 18 x 20 row of single_crochet = 4 inches finished size approximately 16 x 16 inches excluding the handles yarn 24/7 cotton by lion brand® 186 yds/170 m 100g/3 5 oz 100% cotton 4 worsted weight you will need 2 balls denim colour a 1 ball white colour b 1 ball silver colour c hook size g/6 4 mm hook notions yarn needle
